definition: a positive, content filled talk often by a salesperson pitching a product , speak at great length (about something)
details:
noun
- a positive, content filled talk often by a salesperson pitching a product
= example: a positive, content filled talk often by a salesperson pitching a product
= synonyms: patter, line of gab
verb
- speak at great length (about something)
- replay (as a melody)
= synonyms: play
